content.text:
# King of New Orleans

"King of New Orleans" is the lead single from the 1996 Better Than Ezra studio album Friction, Baby. It was issued to radio in July 1996.
Reception
"King of New Orleans" spent seventeen weeks on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart, peaking at No. 5. The single also reached No. 62 on the Billboard Hot 100 Airplay chart.
